name: Marge
description: A modern twist on traditional Georgian dishes in a cozy, elegant atmosphere.

name: Extra Meat
description: The best place in town for high-quality steaks and grilled meats.

name: Palaty
description: Authentic Imeretian cuisine with live folk music in the evenings.

name: Bikentia's Kebabery
